param.name: id
param.doc: The id of the section/subsection to retrieve. This parameter is optional. If id is not set then the top level contents will be returned. If id is set and it is a section then the contents of that section will be returned. If id is set and it is a subsection then the contents of that sub-section will be returned.

param.name: recursive
param.doc: When set to yes the response will include all of the contents of the Kerberos configuration file including sections, sub-section and property names. This parameter is optional.

method.name: GET
method.doc: To retrieve the Kerberos configuration with the RESTful web service, issue an HTTP GET command on the Kerberos configuration resource URI.

request.doc:
Retrieve the top level contents GET https://{appliance_hostname}/wga/kerberos/config
Retrieve a section contents GET https://{appliance_hostname}/wga/kerberos/config/realms
Retrieve a sub-section contents GET https://{appliance_hostname}/wga/kerberos/config/realms/example.com

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

response.doc: There is a problem with the request. The JSON message describes the problem.
File not Found, The requested service does not exist. The JSON message indicates which resource.
An internal error occurred. The JSON message indicates the problem.

Retrieve the top level contents 200 ok [{"id":0, "name":"libdefaults", "type":"section" }, {"id":0, "name":"realms", "type":"section" }, {"id":0, "name":"domain_realm", "type":"section" }, {"id":0, "name":"capaths", "type":"section" }]
Retrieve a section contents 200 ok [{"id":0, "name":"example.com", "type":"section" }]
Retrieve a sub-section contents 200 ok [{"id":0, "name":"kdc", "type":"property" }, {"id":1, "name":"v4_instance_convert", "type":"section" }]

representation.name: KerberosConfigTopLevelComponent
representation.doc: Note: Response body is an array.

param.name: type
param.doc: The type of this entry. Valid values are "section", "property"
